contact.title: A Web Designer and Developer
contact.about: Hello, my name is Jersen I am a Creative Web Designer and Developer. I have a very much experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript. I create websites that work well and look good. Coding have been my passion since the days I started working with computers, but I found myself into web design and development since 2018. </br></br>  I love challenges and I am a risk taker when it comes in designing.
